Package org.mio.progettoingsoft

package org.mio.progettoingsoft

  • Class
    Description
    AdvCardType
    Enumerates the different types of Adventure Cards that can be encountered in the game.
    AdventureCard
     
    ClientMain
    The main class for launching the client application of Galaxy Truckers.
    Component
     
    ComponentType
    Enumerates the different types of components that can be found or built on a spaceship.
    Connector
    Represents the different types of connectors that can be found on spaceship components.
    Cordinate
    Represents a coordinate (row, column) on a game board.
    Direction
    Represents the four cardinal directions: FRONT, BACK, RIGHT, LEFT.
    FlyBoard
    The Flyboard has to be created staticty with FlyBoard.createFlyBorard(GameMode) base of the mode of the game to start
    Game
    Represents a full game session, managing both server-side and client-side responsibilities.
    GameController
    The GameController is responsible for coordinating the game logic, processing events, updating the game model (FlyBoard), and communicating state changes and events back to the connected clients.
    GameManager
    Manages all ongoing game instances and the creation of new games.
    GameState
    Enumerates the various states that the game can be in.
    Player
    Represents a player in the game, managing their personal information, game currency (credits), ship board, and game status.
    ServerMain
    The main class for launching the server application of Galaxy Truckers.
    ShipBoard
    An abstract representation of a player's spaceship board in the Galaxy Trucker game.
